product_name: Teva Fuse-Ion Mesh Water Shoes - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Teva Fuse-Ion Mesh shoes go easily from your water sport of choice to your favorite sporting event afterwards. Grippy soles hold fast to slippery surfaces while the synthetic mesh uppers dry quickly. Flat rubber outsoles offer solid grip on wet rocks and slippery ramps. Synthetic mesh/textile uppers breathe well and dry quickly; mesh interiors pull moisture away from feet to help keep them dry and comfortable. Collapsible heels give you the option of slipping in and out quickly; soft elastic binding around the openings won't irritate your skin. Closeout.
short_description: Teva Fuse-Ion Mesh shoes go easily from your water sport of choice to your favorite sporting event afterwards. Grippy soles hold fast to slippery surfaces while the synthetic mesh uppers dry quickly.
